storyInfo: Feist rallies the workers and rescues Catherine, with the help of the Doctor and Ascalon.

attributes.content: George, everyone willing to go is here.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: What about Tommy?
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: No sign of him.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: That's fine. Volunteers only.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: George.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You found what Catherine left for you, Feist? Was it what you were looking for?
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I'm glad.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Now get going, before you can't.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Wait, what's going on?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Do you know why the Sarkaz took Catherine?
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: She knew too much. They're executing workers like her.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Something didn't feel right, so I had Day climb to the top of the factory to check.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Catherine kept it from us. She thought we didn't know anything.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: But we aren't stupid. We guessed what's going on.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: What are you gonna do?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Nothing in particular.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: We've put up with the Sarkaz for a long time.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: More or less gotten used to it.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Some folk think the Sarkaz will let us go, so long as we put up with them a little longer.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Now they want to do away with Catherine.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: You'll die.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Better than standing around and watching them kill Catherine.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: No one standing here has anything left to lose.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: You're with the Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: We've heard about you. Lots of us are happy for you.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: You've got more important things to do.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Don't let Catherine's sacrifice be in vain.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Doctor, I may have gotten some information from Granny...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But as the leader of this factory, Granny knows more about the Sarkaz production lines than anyone else.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: She has significant strategic value, doesn't she?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: ...I request help from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: Are you there, Ascalon?;I know you're watching... here with me.

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: I'm sure you've identified the hostiles in this sector.;Describe the enemy deployment.

attributes.content: They've tightened defenses, leaving gaps on the outside.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: It's mostly loosely-organized mercenary bands guarding the outer area.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: We need time.;Distract the mercenaries and take out the sentries.

attributes.content: On it.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor, Ascalon.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Feist takes a deep breath.
He sticks his badge to his chest and goes in amongst the workers.
Don't make any rash decisions, Feist.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: I'm not here as a member of the Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I'm here as the grandson of Catherine, as someone who grew up in this factory.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I belong here.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Just like you, I don't want Catherine to die.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I'm not gonna let her die, and I won't let you die either.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The Doctor's people will cut off Sarkaz communications.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Once we rescue Granny and the other factory bosses, we'll have plenty of time to get out of Highbury.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I'll lead you to the Corps.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Everyone will be safe.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: ...Everyone should be safe.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The workers exchange stunned looks.
But they see the fire of hope beginning to burn in each others' eyes.
One by one, they get behind Feist.
They have decided to trust Feist.
Feist! I-I'm going too!
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Tommy... thanks.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But don't.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: You hesitated because your dad's not well, right?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: And there's something I need you to do.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No matter the outcome, you will report to the Sarkaz that we staged a riot.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: It's important. I have to keep the ones who stay behind safe.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Let's go, then.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We'll get the old hands back.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Londinium Workers

attributes.content: Catherine smokes her cigarette quietly.
She watches as the Sarkaz drag one familiar face after another to the makeshift firing range.
She sees on those familiar faces anger, disgust, resignation.
Then, in the end, peace.
She knows her turn will come soon.
She feels a sense of calm that she has never felt before.
Feist was right.
Compromise and subservience will solve no problems.
She must pay for her choices.
But she got to see her grandson one last time, and left him a little gift, before she had to pay.
That's enough.
You're up, grandma.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Take her.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: I can walk on my own.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Oh. Paprika.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Grimm never had you kill anybody, did he?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: ...Never.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Here's your chance.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Learn to kill.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: This is how the Sarkaz treat a kid?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I heard what you said to her. You're right. She doesn't know what war is.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: I didn't want to know what war was, if I could help it. No Sarkaz does.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: But you left us no choice. None of you did. That's why it's time for her to learn.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: I like that look in your eyes, grandma.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: It's the same look I've seen on buddies who died with their eyes wide open.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: I've killed a lot.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: But it doesn't sit right with me, killing someone who can't fight back.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You can go back where you came from, if you don't have the stomach for it.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: How do you know these workers didn't build the weapons that were used to kill your own people?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Morals are for peacetime. This is war. It's an argument we never got to have on fair, equal ground.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I don't need you to tell me that. I just...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Huh? A drone?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Now!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: This is the place! I've scanned the area with the drone!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Move!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: C-Can't I let someone else do it?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: I'm sure Grimm taught you not to question your captain's orders.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Either you kill her, or drop your weapon and I kill you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Do it.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Do it!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: I... I can't!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: ...I always said Grimm was too soft on you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: We're not here to convince the Victorians to give our homeland back. If you can't do it, you're going to get it—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Huh—a drone?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Captain! The workers are revolting!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Feist, we've got the Doctor giving orders here. We'll keep the mercenaries pinned down. Go and get Catherine!
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Are you out of your minds?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: No, we're not.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Do you know how valuable an experienced worker is?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: They're in high demand, you know.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Feist! You—
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: You could have lived longer if you pretended not to know anything.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Too bad Granny always says I never know when to shut up.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You think you can beat me?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: No, but maybe she can.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Wha—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Umph...!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Bollocks, that thing was heavy...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Thanks, George. That felt good.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Thank Feist.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: What about you, Sarkaz? Not gonna fight?
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: ...Girl.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Your captain was right. This isn't the time to talk about right or wrong. We can't.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: But if you don't know what you're fighting for...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Y-You can't go...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Guess I've got no choice then.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Charge!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What's going on? Where is everybody?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'm gonna have to report this, if I don't get a response—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Argh...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The Sarkaz warrior feels weightless.
In his blurring vision, he sees a black figure just before he collapses.
It was another Sarkaz.
Why... Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Last one.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Ascalon is talking to herself, but she puts away the weapon with complete confidence that she is right.
She can clearly see the angry workers routing the Sarkaz mercenaries from her position.
Violence without strength of numbers was easily broken before years of pent-up anger.
The balance of power is reversed. Memories float to the surface.
She casts her gaze in another direction.
The center of Londinium.
We've tied up all the mercs.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: How many injuries?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Not many. The mercenaries with this kid were in a panic and slow to react.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: They didn't even make up their mind to fight.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: W-We—!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: We... we just...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You tried to resist, but you were ambushed by cunning Londiniers.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.options: Ascalon has cleaned up outside.;We don't have much time.

attributes.content: Their way, only a few old timers had to die.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Now the Sarkaz will have all your heads.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Is this your clever idea, Feist? Put all these years of patience to waste?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: If we watched you sacrifice yourselves to save our skins today, there'd be another group of victims tomorrow.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Until everyone only cares about themselves.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: And... that's not your choice to make for all of us.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You're right. But it's not yours either.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: This time, though, everyone came to rescue you of their own accord.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have occupied the city for years... life is hard, but there are some red lines we can't let them cross. If we didn't come here today, we—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The Sarkaz will eventually boil us all.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: George... you too.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: It's not all of you here. That means there are some who don't want to see me come back alive.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Reality is crueler than you think, Feist. Right and wrong isn't so simple.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: But what's done is done...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Catherine looks at Feist. It seems like she wants to say something.
She does not, however.
Let's go.
attributes.name: Catherine
